Experience Yellowstone

Luxury Glamping in Paradise Valley


Dome 1 Dome 2 Dome 3 Dome 4

The Domes

Wake up to some of the most expansive views of the Absaroka-Beartooth mountain range in all of Paradise Valley, and end your evening stargazing into the clear night sky by your personal fire pit.

We do not have TV or internet. We hope our guests can unplug, unwind and experience everything the greater Yellowstone area has to offer. We do provide board games in each dome for rainy days.

Each Dome features a luxurious queen bed, a large bathroom w/ modern appliances and a kitchenette perfect for cooking in, or packing lunches for the trail. The units are also heated and air conditioned for a comfortable stay during any season. Experience nature without sacrificing modern finishes or a warm shower at the end of each day.

Dome 1 Dome 2 Dome 3 Dome 4

Customer Testimonials

We had such a great stay at the Domes! We only wish we could have stayed longer. Which means we will be back soon. The best part of this place is the views You can’t beat waking up to the Absaroka range right outside your wall of “windows” and a cup of coffee/tea from your Adirondack chairs around the outdoor fire pit. Very peaceful. This place puts the glam in glamping.

Sarah

Whether you live in the area or are just passing through you HAVE to stay at The Domes! What an amazing concept that is flawlessly executed! The domes themselves, the amenities, and the views were all above and beyond my expectations! Also close enough to anything you may need including awesome restaurants and things to do! Truly The Domes make me want to come back to Montana and stay here again!

Kate

The only thing I wish we could change was the length of our stay! Hannah was so accommodating in booking our 2-day stay, making our sister road trip even more fun! The location was great - 40 minutes from Yellowstone North entrance and 40 minutes from Bozeman. Beautiful views and a great dome experience!

Colleen

What a cool and fun experience in such a beautiful place! The dome was just as pictured and the views were even more perfect in person. Especially cool at night to see the stars! The bed was super comfy and there was no issue with the temperature inside - it was perfect despite a very chilly and windy night. Kitchen and bathroom are perfect too. The dome is cute and simply decorated with everything you need. Would love to come back in the winter! Thanks for a wonderful experience all around!

Katie

Location

The Domes offer some of the best views in Paradise Valley and are still in a convenient location with easy highway access: a few minutes to the Mallards Rest fishing access which offers unbeatable access to the Yellowstone River, 15 min to Livingston and Emigrant, 40 min to Yellowstone National Park, and 40 minutes to downtown Bozeman.

The units are situated on 100 acres which is shared by a horse ranch. The property also borders 120 acres of public Bureau of Land Management land that guests are welcome to explore.

We do allow pets, but there will be an additional $45 cleaning fee and strict rules to ensure the safety of all guests and their furry friends.

Nearby Activities


There is something for everyone in the Greater Yellowstone Area. Weather you are here to see Yellowstone National Park, adventure off the beaten path, indulge in fine eats, or enjoy local art and music, there is always an amazing experience to be had within 30 minutes of Pitch. We linked some of our favorite local businesses and areas below. In addition, feel free to contact us for any questions or concierge services. Enjoy!

About

Howdy! On your way to Paradise Valley, MT? Let us pitch the tent.

Pitch glamping was started (and built from the ground up!) by two Park High School graduates from Livingston, Montana. After growing up in the valley, we wanted to share our favorite pieces of paradise with you through a unique stay.

We hope you enjoy your time at Pitch!
